TextDecoderStreamEncoding.summary: The encoding read-only property of the interface returns a string containing the name of the encoding algorithm used by the specific decoder.

remarks.para: The encoding is set by the constructor label parameter, and defaults to utf-8.

TextDecoderStreamEncoding.value: A string containing the lower-cased ASCII name of the encoding format.The allowed values are the same as those listed in TextDecoder.encoding (the labels in Encoding API Encodings).
